name: ESCAPE ROOM VR
description:
Story [/]

Where is this ...?

I can't remember who I am

For now, let's escape from this room Overview [/]

This game is a VR escape game.
Solve the mysteries in each stage and uncover the hidden truth. Ｈow to play[/]
Press the button on the stage.
The teleport can be moved with the trackpad button.
You can move the stage by hitting a colored sphere against the center portal. Notes [/]

This game is for HTCVive only.
